title: Canaveral National Seashore: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       The National Park Service makes every effort to keep the public informed about news events, accomplishments, employee recognitions, special and re-occurring events which occur within and around the units of the Park Service. The National Park Service and Eastern National publish the "In The Park" newspaper which provides visit planning information and contains articles on various resource-related topics. Copies of In The Park are available at all park visitor centers. Limited quantities are also available at our entrance station. Canaveral National Seashore provides news releases to local and regional newspapers; news releases can also be found here on our park web site. For all press inquiries, please contact the park's Public Information Officer by phone at (321) 267-1110, or by email.   Park Closure Notices  Road Closure Notices
